backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and per‑user manga CRUD storage with blob support and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI fixes and actor‑readiness safeguards to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling identity state, profile initialization, and routing to the manga list page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: First‑time profile setup dialog that saves the user's display name before allowing app access.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared page layout providing header, footer, and main content structure with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Comprehensive add‑manga form with actor‑readiness gating, validation, genre selection, image upload, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Component for adding, uploading, previewing, and removing manga cover images with upload progress handling.
Displays a manga entry with cover, title, rating, progress, status, and genres in a compact card layout.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Renders a paginated manga list with loading states, empty state UI, add-manga dialog, and pagination controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Pagination UI generating page numbers with ellipses and next/previous buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and triggers query invalidation when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries using the authenticated actor, enabled only when identity is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves and saves the caller's user profile with react-query, invalidating profile data on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state and actions, loading identities and managing login lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Derives a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for manga entries and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Fetches a paginated page of manga entries using the current authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables for light/dark themes, and utility classes for gold-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors mapped to CSS variables, extended fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's feature set and metadata, describing implemented Internet Identity, profile, manga CRUD, storage, and layout fixes.
